title: Treatment Strategies for Acute and Chronic Insomnia
itunes:title: Treatment Strategies for Acute and Chronic Insomnia
description:
Is it safe to use atypical antipsychotics for insomnia? Can we use benzodiazepines? This podcast features the different treatments for acute and chronic insomnia. It also addresses the differential diagnoses and some treatment options for insomnia and comorbid depressive disorders.

Guest: Charles Reynolds M.D.
Interviewer: Mohan Gautam D.O.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Lorena Rodríguez, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: The Clinical Guide to Sleep Issues in Psychiatry - Interview with Charles F. Reynolds III, M.D.
